item.title: Cate Blanchett’s Sustainability Streak Continues at Venice Film Festival in Custom Armani Privé
item.description: Her showing on Wednesday night added another chic chapter in the eco-conscious tradition as she previously wore the Armani Privé look at the SAG Awards in 2022.
